column5: They just started posting the second season of Fish'n Canada on YouTube if anyone is interested
Watching these old shows is hilarious.  Their mutton-chops and mustaches and tight white shorts are rock'n every video.  LOL
LOL...not much has changed in Dryden since those were shot, folks still rocking tight shorts, mullets and mutton chops here...lol.
Hey Limey I have those beat! 1960's soccer (football) shorts I wore in UK back then. Pretty wild!
